mese aarambhaka piwisume sita kemen nagayana mattam hathakin me punya bhumiya pihita atha.aarambhaka bhumiyen nagenahirata mayimwa thawath bim thirayaka nahimipanan wahansege salasum shilpi nyanayen poshitha wi mattam kihipayakin naga yana paridi idikirim kara atha.jala thataka uyan pasukara mese langa wanne swetha warnalepitha samadhi budupilimaya abhiyasatayi.palu mudu bimaka wasara 20 k thula mewan idikirime malawaka injineruwaraya, salasum shilpiya, gruha nirmana shilpiya nam wiharadhipathi waliwehera nyaninda maha sthawirayanoma ya.siyalu idikirim sandaha barapana daruwo nam me thun helaye sadahathiyoma ya.me pin bimen ha theruwan pihita labannata manasika sahanashilathawaya widinata pin kamathi sahanaya apeksha karana sadahathi danan hata meya kembimaki.nyaninda maha sthawirapadayanan wahansege aathma wishwasaya peradariwa aathma shakthiya meheyawamin mewan suwisheshi pujaniya sthanayak nirmanaya idi kara aithihasika wayambaa palathe pudabim ha aadena warthamana niyojanaya udesa nirmana shilpiya lakshanayangenda, adhyathmiya suwaya udesa da, samaja sathkarya aagamika unnathiya wenuwenda, kapawunu shri sambodhi wiharaya aithihasika kurunagala purawarayata aaloka pradipayak bandu ya.

ayahapath kalagunika thaththwaya nisa magin 127 deneku ragath guwan yanayak pakisthanaye islamabad guwan thotupala asala di kadawati athi bawa wides madhya wartha pawasayi. pakisthanaye karachchi nagaraye sita islamabad dakwa gaman karamin boyin 737 wargaye guwan yanayak rawalpindi nagaraya samipaye pradeshayakata mese kadawati athi bawa pakisthana madhya wartha karayi. aapada kandayam guwan yanaya kadawatimata lakwu sthanaya wetha langawemin sitina bawath, namuth ayahapath kalagunika thaththwaya nisa marga awahiratha pawathina bawath polis niladharin sandahan kara thibe. kadawatimen pasu guwan yanaya giniganimata lakwa athi bawath, ema ginnen yanaya sampurnayen winasha wi athi bawath wides madhya wetha adahas dakwamin polisiya prakasha kara atha. islamabad ha rawalpindihi siyaluma rohalwala hadisi thaththwayak prakashayata pathkara athi bawa da madhya wartha sandahan karayi. guwan yanaya kadawatimata lakwu awasthawe magin 118 deneku ha karyaya mandala samajikayin 09 wu bawa da sandahanya.

aththenma sirisena samanga rata rata aanduwa pihitawanna katha karana udawiya saba eksath jathika pakshikayinda yanna saka sahithaya.bim mattame minisun rawatamin awyaja e.ja.pa hadawath bandesiye thaba sirisenata puja karanna sarasima ketharam sahasida ?.dina 52ke kumanthranaya ada athamunta amathakaya.rate mulika nithiya amu amuwe ullanghanaya kara athi bahuthara e.ja.pa chandayen balayata aa sirisena kisidu hirikithayak nathiwa nithiwirodhiwa agamathikama mahinda rajapakshata dun sirisena ha ekwa aandu pihitawanna oya kiyana bim mattame e.ja.pakshikayin kisida ek wanne natha.eya niyathaya.manda athamunta amathaka unath pakshikayinta dina 52ka amathaka wanne natha.
